name: LSD
description:
LSD is the new match 3 game with beautiful juicy anime graphics! Classic light casual gameplay in the best traditions of the genre. It's easy to learn. Line up and win!
Explore casual match3 in company with cute anime girls!Game features
  • Cute graphics
  • Match3
  • Classic casual gameplay
  • Simple and fun!
  • Achievements!
  • Selective difficulty level

In our game you will need to help overcome the path of a sweet girl's anime to the stars. Collect in each level 3 stars to achieve mastery in the match3 game! It's easy to start and hard to stop.
